fulltext:
RALPH THAI 
Date of Birth 
Mar 20, 1991 
Address 
Vinh Loc A Commune, Binh Chanh District, Ho Chi Minh City, Viet Nam  
Email  thanhcuong.thai@gmail.com 
Mobile  +84901185659 
Skype  Thanhcuong.thai 
Linkedin  https://vn.linkedin.com/in/cuong-thai-084762ab 
s 
CAREER OBJECTIVE 
Taking challenges where I can demonstrate and enhance my abilities, skills, connections and market 
knowledge to efficiently complete multiple assignments: Sales, marketing, organization, negotiation, 
proactive problem solving, and enthusiasm in establishing effective working relationships for increasing 
market share and the success of organization. 
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCES 
09/2016 – Now 
 Grain Trader/broker (at Harvest Commodities): 
Develop and expand grain, feed materials business (Wheat, Corn, DDGS, Canola Meal,…) and cashew nuts: 
 Develop and expand feed materials business for many International Traders: keep approaching new 
Customers for the business, discuss with Traders on the sale plans, suggest new trade opportunities 
and product development. 
 Developing Objectives and Strategies: Establishing long-range objectives and specifying the 
strategies and actions to achieve them. 
 Responsible for Sales: Follow the Customer’s demand, price targets and the sources from 
International Traders to execute the sales. 
 Manage Customer, Suppliers relationships: Be the middle man to comply Customer expectations 
and Supplier’s best acceptance.  
 Ensure optimal Buyers satisfaction: by sharing with/consulting Customers about market 
information/insights, market trend, market fundamentals of both local and CNF. 
 Selling or Influencing Others: Influence Customers to buy merchandise/goods or to otherwise 
change their minds or actions, create the demand. Convince Supplier to aggressive in sales. 
 Responsible for handling of Buyer’s commercial issues/complaints. 
 Market, information, data, trend analysis: Closely observe international and local market 
information to take the advantages in sale opportunities or risk assessment. 
 Self-learning: Keep tracking of the results and take corrective action plans, actions. 
 Contributes to continuously improve the marketing plan: Improve the marketing plan to approach to 
new Customers, and strengthen the relationship with exist Customers. Visits existing as well as 
potential Customers. 
 Making Decisions and Solving Problems: Analyzing information and evaluating results to choose 
the best solution and solve problems. 
 Interpersonal Relationships: Establishing and Maintaining Interpersonal by communicating with 
Customers and Suppliers.  
 Organizing, Planning, and Prioritizing Work: Developing specific goals and plans to prioritize, 
organize, and accomplish the work. 
 Information exchange, planning within the team. 
 Loading, shipping, quality checking, report (for Cashew Kernel) 
 Business Staff at Itochu Vietnam: 
Assisting Section Manager (SM) for purchasing and sales coordination of the products (woodchip) in 
Vietnam: 
 Business support: Update, analyze market information, price trend, supply and deploy the reports. 
 Ensure the quality in accordance with Customer’s quality requirements: Supplier’s factories 
checking, defects analysis, improvement plans propose/following. 
 Delivery operation smoothly: Work with suppliers and staffs from Head Office for all shipment 
preparations. Self planning/arranging to attend ship loading, visit Suppliers. 
 Planning, arranging Customer’s visits. 
 Take the responsibilities of the South and the Middle market. 
 To be in charge of: GSAP system and Paper section 
 Team work: working with colleagues in Hanoi office, HCM office, and overseas office for all 
shipment readiness. 
  Head of Workcell Production Supervisor at Jabil Vietnam: 
 Head of Sierra Wireless Workcell Production: Leaded Manufacturing from start-up to sustaining 
manufacturing excellence emphasizing the principals of safety, quality, productivity. 
 Management: Motivating, coaching, and disciplining Production team and activities to ensure 
smoothly continuous running with high performance of quality, productivity, revenue from start-up 
to more than 1.5 million. 
 Demonstrate commitment to customer: Anticipates, meets and exceeds customer’s customizations 
and highly achieve all OTD with 10 working months. 
 Give technical expertise: Working with the various teams on maximizing machine capacity and 
planning efficiency, utilizing manpower and standardize work environment.  
11/2014- 10/2015 
04/2016- 09/2016 
 Accomplishes manufacturing staff results by communicating job expectations: planning, allocating 
personnel, monitoring and appraising job results. 
 Team working: Initiating and fostering a spirit of cooperation within and between departments. 
 Monitor and enhance Production performance by reviewing and creating Production reports. 
 Cost management: Continuous improve to save cost for Workcell by reducing defects, scrap… 
 Taking over 3 shifts of the biggest Workcell (Ingenico Workcell): Possess proven tracking records to 
monitor New Procducts, Quality, productivity, Supervisor’s performance. 
 To be in charge of: New Product Introduction, quality, productivity, Work In Process control, and 
related Projects. 
 Followed to ensure Production Supervisors and Supervisors in Training are working effectively in 
their roles. 
 Set expectations and guide the Production Supervisors to meet the expectations of continuous 
improvement. 
 Training/ Activate New Leaders. New leader was the best employee. 
 Directly report to Top Managers. Daily, Weekly, monthly report to Managers. 
 EIT-Production Supervisor at Jabil Vietnam:  
Executed all manufacturing and relevant departments scopes as a Manufacturing support team member.  
 Human management: Supervised 140 employees. 
 Create Production procedures and training materials. 
 Plan achievement: Execute the daily production to ensure products are delivered on time and resolve any 
production issues. 
 Improve production activities, ensure a proper process quality management: Organizes the lines for 
maximum efficiency, seek continued improvement in lowering line and plant defects per million (DPM). 
 Keep improving on manufacturing by doing Blitz, A3, and DMAIC projects. 
 Data analysis: Resolving problems by gathering, analyzing manufacturing reports (yield, scrap, 
downtime, Quick Respond Quality Control, and Overall Labor Efficiency data); investigating issues; 
identifying solutions and recommending actions to maximize productivity. 
 Mastering in creating professional manufacturing report by using MS Office to figure out manufacturing 
issues and propose the improvement plans. 
 Project team leader: Taking lead in applying new changes and systems for HCM site (Shop Floor 
Monitor, E-Pull…). Leading other teams in HCM site to improve manufacturing processes, and deploy 
New Products Introduction.  
 Bidding vendor team leaders: Involve in Bidding process, quality checking… 
11/2013–11/2014 
SKILLS 
 Strong communication skills 
 Interpersonal skill with high ability to convince, and negotiate 
 Customer segmentation understanding. 
 Knowledge of export / import. 
 Management skills: Strong strategic thinking, flexible, good problem/conflict solving ability, decision 
making skills, effective team working as well as individual working. 
 Self-learning: Keep the eager to learn and create the ambitiousness to improve myself. 
 Strong motivational and leadership skills. 
 Computer skills: SAP, MS (word, excel, Power Point …), internet savvy. 
CAPABILITIES 
 Highly motivated, fast-learner and eager to learn new things. 
 Excellent communication skills in written and verbal. 
 Sense of responsibility, carefulness in working, strong analytical and organizational,  
 Team working: Contributes to success of whole team by accomplishing related results, constructive 
feedback, willing to share knowledge and experiences with peers.  
 Quick adaptability and able to work well independently or teamwork even under high pressure. 
EDUCATIONAL BACKGROUNDS 
 Bachelor of Industrial Engineering. Faculty of mechanical engineering – Ho Chi 
Minh city University of Technology and Education. 
 Studied 8 additional subjects of Business Administration in University of 
Economics Ho Chi Minh city: Marketing, Management, Quality management, corporate governance,... 
09/2009 - 09/2013 
09/2015 – 04/2016 
CERTIFICATION 
LEAN Six Sigma – Bronze Certified: From Jul 17-2015 to Jul 17-2018 
EXTRA CURRICULAR ACTIVITIES 
 Take part in support for University Entrance Exam (2011). 
 Being officer the examination at The University of Technical Education HCM City. 
 Part time for my lecturer in interior decoration field as his assistant.

educations.major_categories_detail: Kỹ thuật cơ khí và cơ kỹ thuật

educations.major: Quản lý đô thị và công trình
educations.school: University of Economics Ho Chi Minh city
